links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(Pi^4/90); for (n=1, 20000, write("b013680.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Apr 29 2009]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
